name: multiworld (itch)
description:
is a funny rpg video game where you play as a 13 year old "stick-blob man or something" (real name Bob (actually its not)). and 3 other friends you meet along your journey of stopping a powerful Orb in the center of space that absorbs the core of every planet near the Orb.

(note from orangey, im bad at writing.)


9 years ago, three people saved the world from destruction of the Orb. These three people had special powers that can only defeat the Orb. During the fight, two of them have sadly lost their lives to it. Their powers were given to the last person standing. He was able to seal away the Orb from coming back, but even when it was sealed away, he was in an endless white void, trapped within' the Orb's seal, making him forget... everything. 

Today, a mysterious glow appeared and it keeps flickering, almost like something is trying to get out.

this is a rebuild of multiworld, and it looks better than the old version imo.

Credits to FrazzledMango for composing most of the soundtrack of this game.
